channel.title: Fun pk giving pk points? help
channel.description: Okay i have made a fun pk arena and when a player kills another player, they do not recieve pk points. just wanted to know how i can make the winning opponent recieve a certain amount of pk points?

item.title: Fun pk giving pk points? help
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

bbl111:

You would have to add a point system to the Player Killing Method in your Fun PK.

Wrong, just call the pk points void (commonly used is Pkz, not sure about the case so check on that) And call it in the funpk method to make it give a person pk points.

Read full topic
item.source: Fun pk giving pk points? help
